name: part_013
file: tmp_【#ひろがるホロライブDAY2】hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade holo＊27 stage【チラ見せ】 [pDLDcU3dWp8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

subtitles.original: だって限界やんなっちゃっても　辞めてった時も
subtitles.english: But even if I reached my limit and wanted to quit

subtitles.original: 勝ちたい理由が　負けない理由で　ずっとずっとここにいるよ
subtitles.english: The reason I want to win is the reason I won't lose, and I'll be here forever

subtitles.original: 大嫌いな自分にチャオって言って　バイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Say 'Ciao' to the self I hate, and bye-bye-bye

subtitles.original: 代われちゃう　ほら代われちゃう　ねぇ素敵じゃない？　ごっこ遊びじゃない
subtitles.english: I can change, look, I can change. Isn't it wonderful? This isn't just playing house

subtitles.original: 限界やんなっちゃっても　無理って言えないよ
subtitles.english: Even if I reach my limit, I can't say it's impossible

subtitles.original: 勝ちたい理由が　負けない理由が　ずっとずっとここにあるよ
subtitles.english: The reason I want to win, the reason I won't lose, is right here forever

subtitles.original: 大嫌いな自分にチャオって言って　バイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Say 'Ciao' to the self I hate, and bye-bye-bye

subtitles.original: 超えれちゃう　ほら超えれちゃう　ねぇ始まりじゃない？　ごっこ遊びじゃない
subtitles.english: I can overcome it, look, I can overcome it. Isn't this a beginning? This isn't just playing house

subtitles.original: 代われちゃう　ほら代われちゃう　ねぇ素敵じゃない？　ごっこ遊びじゃない
subtitles.english: I can change, look, I can change. Isn't it wonderful? This isn't just playing house

subtitles.original: 絶対　素敵な僕見つけようぜ
subtitles.english: Let's definitely find a wonderful me

subtitles.original: あたしヴァンパイア　いいの？吸っちゃっていいの？
subtitles.english: I'm a vampire. Is it okay? Is it okay to suck your blood?

subtitles.original: もう無理もう無理なんて　悪い子だね
subtitles.english: Saying "No more, no more," you're such a bad kid

subtitles.original: 試したいな　いっぱいで吐きたいな
subtitles.english: I want to try it. I want to drink until I'm full and vomit

subtitles.original: まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: You can still go on, definitely

subtitles.original: 最低最高ずっといききしてる
subtitles.english: The absolute best and worst, I'm constantly going back and forth

subtitles.original: 甘くなる不安の果実
subtitles.english: The fruit of anxiety that becomes sweet

subtitles.original: 脳を果てしない吐息をしても
subtitles.english: Even if I exhale an endless sigh from my brain

subtitles.original: いらないだけうるさいだけ
subtitles.english: It's just unnecessary, just noisy

subtitles.original: 誰かと居れば　それはそれで
subtitles.english: If I'm with someone, that's that

subtitles.original: 揺るがせた気持ちに　抗えない
subtitles.english: I can't resist the feelings that were shaken

subtitles.original: 離れていても　感じてる変
subtitles.english: Even if we're apart, I feel something's strange

subtitles.original: 溶け合った時間が　始めれるかも
subtitles.english: The time we blended together might start running

subtitles.original: 今　この血も　切ないも
subtitles.english: Now, this blood, and this sadness too

subtitles.original: 君のすべてを　食らうまで絶頂
subtitles.english: Until I devour all of you—climax

subtitles.original: あたしヴァンパイア　いいの？吸っちゃっていいの？
subtitles.english: I'm a vampire. Is it okay? Is it okay to suck your blood?

subtitles.original: もう無理もう無理なんて　悪い子だね
subtitles.english: Saying "No more, no more," you're such a bad kid

subtitles.original: 試したいな　いっぱいで吐きたいな
subtitles.english: I want to try it. I want to drink until I'm full and vomit

subtitles.original: まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: You can still go on, definitely

subtitles.original: 求めちゃってもがいたから
subtitles.english: Because I sought it and struggled

subtitles.original: 手を振るように　始めまして
subtitles.english: Like waving a hand, nice to meet you

subtitles.original: 愛嬌をください　まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: Give me some charm. You can still go on, definitely

subtitles.original: あたしヴァンパイア　まずはこっちおいで
subtitles.english: I'm a vampire. First, come over here

subtitles.original: 内緒の想い　洗いざらい
subtitles.english: All my secret thoughts, washed clean

subtitles.original: 吐き出したなら　まさに馬鹿に
subtitles.english: If I've vomited them out, it's just foolish

subtitles.original: 誇り切れないけど　あまりじゃない
subtitles.english: I can't be fully proud, but it's not too bad

subtitles.original: そっと明日まで　待ってるの
subtitles.english: Quietly waiting until tomorrow

subtitles.original: 繰り返す嫌だ　はぐらかした
subtitles.english: Repeating "I hate it," I dodged the question

subtitles.original: いつだってチャンスを　逃すのが
subtitles.english: I'm always the one to miss the chance

subtitles.original: 止めどなき想い　叶えたいけど
subtitles.english: Endless thoughts, I want them to come true, but

subtitles.original: 重なって押しつぶされちゃうのかも
subtitles.english: Maybe they'll pile up and crush me

subtitles.original: 今　この血も　切ないも　君の
subtitles.english: Now, this blood, and this sadness too... yours...

subtitles.original: 全て楽しくなっちゃう
subtitles.english: Everything becomes fun

subtitles.original: 気持ちよくなっちゃう　溺れるまで
subtitles.english: It starts to feel good, until I drown

subtitles.original: 癖になれるぜ絶頂
subtitles.english: I can get addicted—climax

subtitles.original: あたしヴァンパイア　いいの？吸っちゃっていいの？
subtitles.english: I'm a vampire. Is it okay? Is it okay to suck your blood?

subtitles.original: もう無理もう無理なんて　悪い子だね
subtitles.english: Saying "No more, no more," you're such a bad kid

subtitles.original: 試したいな　いっぱいで吐きたいな
subtitles.english: I want to try it. I want to drink until I'm full and vomit

subtitles.original: まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: You can still go on, definitely

subtitles.original: 死に物ヴァンパイア　いいの？吸っちゃっていいの？
subtitles.english: Desperate vampire. Is it okay? Is it okay to suck your blood?

subtitles.original: もう無理もう無理なんて　言わせても死に際
subtitles.english: Even if I make you say "No more, no more," at the moment of death

subtitles.original: 絶対いけないほら絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: Definitely can't go—look, you definitely can

subtitles.original: 君の
subtitles.english: Yours...

subtitles.original: 認めたくないから　せめて今宵目
subtitles.english: Because I don't want to admit it, at least for tonight

subtitles.original: 足が見えるような　泡の中で
subtitles.english: In the bubbles where feet are visible

subtitles.original: 愛嬌をください　まだ絶対いけるよ
subtitles.english: Give me some charm. You can still go on, definitely

subtitles.original: 君のヴァンパイア　まずはこっちおいで
subtitles.english: Your vampire. First, come over here

subtitles.original: ちょっと背伸びなステップで　おっちょこちょわわわ
subtitles.english: With a slightly grown-up step, being a bit clumsy-wawawa

subtitles.original: みんなー！あにょー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Anyo!

subtitles.original: ルーナ、参上！
subtitles.english: Luna, here!

subtitles.original: もう、何しにきたの？
subtitles.english: Geez, what are you here for?

subtitles.original: みんな！　新時代のルーナのステージ、
subtitles.english: Everyone! Luna's new era stage,

subtitles.original: 一緒に盛り上げていくのらー！
subtitles.english: Let's fire it up together-nora!

subtitles.original: アイとかコイとか全部コトノハ
subtitles.english: Love and romance are all just words

subtitles.original: がっかりするだけ　ダメ押しするだけ
subtitles.english: Only resulting in disappointment, only adding more bad news

subtitles.original: あたしばかりダサい逆相乗
subtitles.english: I'm the only one with this uncool reverse synergy

subtitles.original: 本当のところは　あなたに酔いたい
subtitles.english: The truth is, I want to get drunk on you

subtitles.original: 失敗するのに　ビビってるだけ
subtitles.english: I'm just scared of failing

subtitles.original: 格好なしの　きみしめの条件じゃん
subtitles.english: It's an uncool, 'holding you tight' condition

subtitles.original: こんな時どんな　顔すればいいか教えてほしいの
subtitles.english: Tell me what kind of face I should make at a time like this

subtitles.original: 愛してるだとか　そんな言葉で壊れてみたいの
subtitles.english: I want to try being broken by words like 'I love you'
